system.description: Beginning at 5th level, you learn to briefly focus and make the most out of your next strike. If you haven’t yet moved on your turn, you can use your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.d8k1x28y4vn6h3q5]{Cunning Action} to Aim, gaining advantage on the next attack roll you make before the start of your next turn. If you do so, your Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your turn.
